page.title: 06Games
page.content: Lots of games are played by 5 to 7 year olds. Their favourite is{TAG}. This is how you play{IT.} Someone is on{IT}they face a wall and count to ten. They turn around,if they see anyone with their feet on the ground they run to tag them. If they don't tag them they then try to find someone standing on a step.The person on the step has to run. If they stay where they are, they are now on{IT}. {THERE ARE MANY DIFFERENT TAGS: {Chain Tag},where those caught join hands;{Witches Glue Pot},when those caught are sent to "prison",and{Stuck {in the Mud},when those tagged can be released from the tag by someone still free crawling through their legs. by Deborah J.Thomas.
